snippet.title: Mega Drive Longplay [147] PHELIOS
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by /Y\ad/Y\atty

Yeah, I saw the cgr review and thaught it needed a longplay ;)

The game was completed on Expert difficulty (unlocked by completing on Advanced first).

Find the Sword PHELIOS
The gods are at war! Apollo, the sun deity, must move heaven, earth, and the underworld to rescue Artemis, goddess of the moon.  She's been taken by Typhon, ruler of the darkness.  Galloping on Pegasus, his winged horse, Apollo slashes his way towards Artemis with the sword of light.

The game seems to be lacking in any worthwhile powerups making the primary fire almost useless.  I found it easier just to use the charge shot most of the time, and the bosses took so much damage id have been here all night trying to kill them without the charged shot.

The gfx are about right for 1990/1991 time and the musics not bad. Some nice parralax effects in places which seems to be an under used effect in this game.  The final level on the runup to the boss seems out of place. -
